channel.title: Loyalty Titles Problem
channel.description:
How can I make it so that there is a space in between the players name and in-between the loyalty title? And how can I make it so there is also colored text in the typing area? I think you can see what I mean by this picture:
[img]http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w426/IMakeTheLedgeEnd/Problem-4.png[/img]

item.title: Loyalty Titles Problem
item.dc:creator: @Trade_Me Trade Me
item.description:
@Trade_Me wrote:

Thank you for trying, But I have done that… That’s why I have came here to see if anyone had knew…

Read full topic

item.title: Loyalty Titles Problem
item.dc:creator: @Skizard Skizard
item.description:
@Skizard wrote:

I’m not really sure but there’s a tutorial with adding it there. If the colors aren’t showing then you can try adding in the other colors like or whatever they were. Sorry I don’t work with these anymore. There was a tutorial though before that I had used for it and it worked.
Search on Google how to add RSFont or whatever it was called.
Sorry I can’t be more helpful.

Read full topic

item.title: Loyalty Titles Problem
item.dc:creator: @Skizard Skizard
item.description:
@Skizard wrote:

Where the Loyalty Titles are in the client make a space after those.
Like:
"Freakshow "
